items.summary: Replace the placeholder `App` component (currently returning `null`) with a real application shell that mounts TanStack Router using the existing `routeTree` so the site loads and routes render (Home, Menu, About, Contact, Signup, Checkout). This must be implemented without editing `frontend/src/main.tsx` (immutable) by making `frontend/src/App.tsx` render the router.

Add a minimal, user-friendly runtime fallback so that if the frontend throws during initial render (including router initialization), users see an English error message with a refresh instruction instead of a blank screen.
